name: Beefender (Alpha)
description:
Description

Manage a small troop of bees, each with one of three possible classes, to grow and expand your hive.

The three possible bee types are Scout Bees, Worker Bees and Drone Bees.

- Scout Bees are responsible for venturing into the forest to gather pollen from flowers.

- Worker Bees are mainly responsible for converting collected pollen into honey (which can then be used to upgrade the hive and it's bees). A secondary responsibility of the worker bee is to replant flowers at the cost of honey.

- Drone Bees are responsible for keeping the hive safe by either defending against incoming enemies of the hive or by attacking potential threats.

Credits
